page.title: 18RECREATION II
page.content:
{FRANCIS SPORTS CENTRE (cont.)} The playing fields connected with the sports centre are for the use of the general public. In the winter it is used for football and in the summer a cricket square and a running track are available.
{3.ACCESS SPORTS CENTRE} This is a private sports centre for use of members only. It is a modern building with a floodlit area and playing field. A number of sports are available in the hall.
{4.JONES MEMORIAL GROUND} This is a large public ground which includes an adventure playground, tennis courts and playing fields which are used for football and rugby but no summer sports.There are also a cafeteria and changing facilities.
